headline: Markets Switch to "Risk-Off" Ahead of Trump at Davos
summary: Off session lows by a whisker, the Dow shed -870 points, -1.76%, while the S&P 500 lost -43 points, -2.06%, and the tech-heavy Nasdaq dropped -561 points, -2.39%.

headline: United Airlines’ 2025 Results Soar Past Expectations
summary: United Airlines’ fourth-quarter and full-year 2025 results soared past Wall Street’s expectations.  The carrier reported fourth-quarter adjusted earnings of $3.10 a share on revenue of $15.4 billion, up 4.8% and the highest quarterly revenue in United history, beating expectations.  Revenue of $59.07 billion, up 3.5% and the highest in United’s history, was slightly above the $59.05 billion expected.

headline: Stocks to Watch Tuesday Recap: Netflix, Intel, 3M, United Airlines
summary: ↘️ Netflix (NFLX): The streaming giant's shares dropped about 5% afterhours following the company's quarterly update, which featured revenue and profit that topped analyst expectations. ↗️ United Airlines (UAL): The Chicago-based carrier said it expects earnings to jump, thanks in part to its pricier seats and loyalty program.

headline: United Q4 earnings are 'nice conclusion' to wild 2025: Analyst
summary: United Airlines (UAL) topped its fourth quarter earnings estimates and guidance figures, reporting adjusted earnings of $3.10 per share (vs. expectations of $2.92) and revenue of $13.93 billion (vs. expectations of $13.87 billion). Third Bridge Global Head of Analysts Peter McNally takes a look at what United's latest earnings release represent for the airline operator after a generally rocky past year for the industry. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination Overtime.

headline: United: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: CHICAGO (AP) — United Airlines Holdings Inc. UAL) on Tuesday reported fourth-quarter earnings of $1.04 billion. The Chicago-based company said it had profit of $3.19 per share.

headline: Dow Jones Tumbles 871 Points On Trump's Greenland Threats; Nvidia, Tesla Skid As Netflix Falls Late
summary: The S&P 500 and Nasdaq broke key support on Trump's Greenland push with his Davos speech on tap. Nvidia, Tesla and other megacaps slumped. Netflix fell late.

headline: United Airlines (NASDAQ:UAL) Posts Q4 CY2025 Sales In Line With Estimates
summary: Airline company United Airlines Holdings (NASDAQ:UAL) met Wall Streets revenue expectations in Q4 CY2025, with sales up 4.8% year on year to $15.4 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $3.10 per share was 5.4% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: United stock gets lift after Q4 earnings, guidance top estimates
summary: United Airlines (UAL) reported its fourth quarter earnings results after the market close on Tuesday, topping adjusted earnings ($3.10 per share vs. expectations of $2.92) and revenue ($13.93 billion vs. expectations of $13.87 billion) estimates. Market Domination Overtime Host Josh Lipton dives into the earnings release, including the airline operator's guidance forecasts for 2026. headline: United Airlines Q4 and Full Year EPS Beat Wall Street Expectations, With Full Year EPS Up Year-Over-Year
summary: United Airlines (UAL) today reported fourth-quarter and full-year 2025 financial results that exceeded Wall Street expectations and were within guidance. The airline's diluted earnings per share of $10.20 and adjusted diluted earnings per share1 of $10.62 for 2025 rose versus 2024.

headline: United Airlines Reports Earnings Tuesday. What Airline Stocks Need to Fly Higher.

Wall Street is expecting  United  to post earnings per share of $2.93 on revenue of $15.4 billion.  As with  Delta  the airline’s forward guidance may prove to be more important.
